goal: Create a more intuitive, beginner-friendly learning path for LeetCode/DSA, moving away from technical jargon and focusing on analogies, micro-patterns, and a structured first-steps experience.
notes: Created analogies for all 16 core algorithmic patterns
Restructured Guide to use a 5-level beginner-to-master progression
Updated problem mapping to ensure all database problems are correctly labeled with intuitive patterns
Added visual analogy tags to the Guide UI
